name: users_update
description: Updates the user profile and returns the updated user data

display_name.description: The full name of the user. Might for example be first and last name

body.description: The data for the created user

$ul: **avatar_url**: The avatar URL of the user
**can_change_password**: User is required to send an old password in order to change the password.
**display_name**: The full name of the user. Might for example be first and last name
**email**: The email address of the user
**id**: The unique id (UUID) of the user
**name**: The unique name that is used to identify the user.
**origin**: The creation origin of this user
**permissions**: The permissions the user has for the app
